name: numnom-extension
description: Download stock price and dividend data

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:scripts && bun run build:copy
scripts.build:scripts: bun build src/content/index.ts --outfile dist/content.js --target browser && bun build src/background/index.ts --outfile dist/background.js --target browser && bun build src/popup/index.ts --outfile dist/popup.js --target browser
scripts.build:copy: cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp public/icon.png dist/ && cp public/popup.html dist/
